headline: Ritz recall 2025: Mislabeled peanut butter cracker sandwiches pose risk of life-threatening allergic reaction
summary: A labeling error could leave people with peanut allergies at serious risk. Here’s a full list of products impacted by the recall.

headline: Mondelez (MDLZ) Urges EU to Delay Deforestation Law Amid Cocoa Market Turmoil
summary: Mondelez International, Inc. (NASDAQ:MDLZ) is one of the 12 best consumer goods stocks billionaires are quietly buying. On July 4, MDLZ, owner of Cadbury, called for a delay to the European Union’s upcoming deforestation law, citing record-high cocoa prices and ongoing supply disruptions. While once supportive of the legislation—which bans imports tied to deforestation—Mondelez now […]
